metrics.name: Statistical forecast quantity error rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period in the past where Statistical Forecast Quantity Error is above 30%

metrics.name: Statistical forecast quantity bias rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases in a certain period where Statistical Forecast Quantity Bias is above 10% or less then -10%

metrics.name: Percentage of products without forecast
metrics.description: Percentage of products which could not be forecasted by the forecasting algorithm
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(DISTINCT("Product ID")) FILTER(
	WHERE (
		SELECT SUM("Statistical Fcst Qty") = 0
	)
AND "Material Type ID" = 'FERT'
)
/
COUNT(DISTINCT ("Product ID")) FILTER(
	WHERE "Material Type ID" = 'FERT'
)
* 100

metrics.name: Percentage of products with unconsumed forecast
metrics.description: Percentage of products with an open forecast in a certain period

metrics.name: Combinations over or under forecasted
metrics.description: Number of combinations which are constantly being over or under forecasted

metrics.name: Products with manually updated sales history
metrics.description: Number of products for which sales history was updated manually by planners for a certain period

metrics.name: Percentage of products with considerable forecast override
metrics.description: Percentage of products for which the difference between statistical forecast and final consensus demand is considerable in a certain period

metrics.name: Percentage of products not touched by IO
metrics.description: Percentage of products not part of any Inventory Optimization run in a certain period

metrics.name: Products without inventory plan
metrics.description: Number of products for which there is no safety stock planned in a certain period

metrics.name: Inventory override rate
metrics.description: Percentage of cases where the inventory was overwritten by a planner in the current planning cycle
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Finalize Inventory Plan'))
		> (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Run Inventory Optimization'))
	)
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION ${affected_periods_in_the_future}
) * 100

metrics.name: Overstocking rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations in the current planning cycle with more Stock on Hand than the target
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE "Inventory Target" > 0 
	AND "Stock on Hand" > "Inventory Target"	
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
) * 100

metrics.name: Sales forecast override rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations where the sales forecast was overwritten manually by a planner

metrics.name: Market forecast override rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations where the market forecast was overwritten manually by a planner

metrics.name: Understocking rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations in the current planning cycle with less Stock on Hand than the target
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE ("Inventory Target" > "Stock on Hand") 
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(CASE_ID) FILTER(
	WHERE DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
) * 100

metrics.name: Capacity over-utilization
metrics.description: Number of combinations with capacity utilization is more than 100% in a certain period

metrics.name: Demand unfulfilled rate
metrics.description: Percentage of products with consensus demand higher than the delivered in a certain period

metrics.name: Percentage of products not touched by supply planning
metrics.description: Percentage of products not part of any supply operator execution in a certain period

metrics.name: Not planning relevant products
metrics.description: Number of products which are not relevant for supply chain planning

metrics.name: Percentage of products with not efficient planning
metrics.description: Percentage of products in the current month where consensus demand was adjusted/updated after supply planning run
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Create Consensus Demand'))
	> (SELECT FIRST(end_time)
		WHERE event_name IN ('Run Supply Heuristics / Optimizer'))
	)
	AND DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()) = "MONTH"
)
/
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "Consensus Demand Plan Qty" > 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION ${affected_periods_in_the_future}
) * 100

metrics.name: Significant products with no statistical forecast
metrics.description: Number of combinations with ABC/XYZ segmentation based analysis of top selling products for forecasting process
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "ABC Id" IN ('A','B') 
	AND "XYZ Id" IN ('X','Y') 
	AND "Statistical Fcst Qty" = 0
)

metrics.name: Significant products with no inventory plan
metrics.description: Number of combinations with ABC/XYZ segmentation based analysis of top selling products for inventory management
metrics.signalFragment:
COUNT(case_id) FILTER(
	WHERE "ABC Id" IN ('A','B') 
	AND "XYZ Id" IN ('X','Y') 
	AND "Inventory Target" = 0
	AND "MONTH" >= (DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW()))
	AND ("MONTH" - DATE_TRUNC('month', NOW())) < DURATION ${affected_periods_in_the_future}
)

metrics.name: Cycle time of reconciliation review
metrics.description: Average time taken from 'Start Reconciliation review' to 'Complete Reconciliation review'
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Reconciliation review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Reconciliation review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)

metrics.name: Cycle time of management review
metrics.description: Average time taken from 'Start Management review' to 'Complete Management review'
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Management review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Management review')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)

metrics.name: Cycle time of demand planning
metrics.description: Average time taken from 'Start Demand Planning' to 'Complete Demand Planning'
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Demand Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)

metrics.name: Cycle time of supply planning
metrics.description: Average time taken from 'Start Supply Planning' to 'Complete Supply Planning'
metrics.signalFragment:
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Complete Supply Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)
-
AVG ((SELECT AVG (END_TIME) FILTER (
	WHERE EVENT_NAME IN ('Start Supply Planning')
	AND "Step Status" = 'COMPLETED')) 
)

metrics.name: Perfect demand fulfillment rate
metrics.description: Percentage of combinations in a certain period with consensus demand delivered equal to consensus demand

variables.name: affected_periods_in_the_past
variables.description: Period in the past affected by the current planning cycle

variables.name: affected_periods_in_the_future
variables.description: Period in the future affected by the current planning cycle
